title: Intrazone 1-2 (Brainstorm - 1993) (Talon-Novus-HD) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 2 Issues

Intrazone #1-2
Publisher:  Brainstorm Comics
Publication Date:  March - April 1993

Creator, Writer, and Artist:  Scott Harrison
Letterer:  Gary Peterson
Cover Artist:  Scott Harrison

Field Report
Introducing field reporter Linnea Steele who ventures into the dangerous Thirty-Ninth District to cover a riot.

Doorway to Destiny
An eight-page story that follows a nubile faerie girl as she makes her way through a forest of mushrooms (magic?) to find her destiny.

This issue boasts a provocative painted cover by Scott Harrison. The letters page features an essay by writer/artist Michael L. Halbleib titled "How to Draw Dirty Comics With Your Wife's Blessing: An introduction to the mysterious Ms. Nyght" (a promotional piece for Brainstorm's NYGHT SCHOOL adult comic). This issue also contains an "Exhibition Page" featuring a pin-up by artist Gustavo Pabon of Amityville, NY.

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
